name: Bingo for Bad People
description:
Inspired by the bingo boards used by Twitch streamers like Hannah Reloaded and some...awkward yet predictable conversations with family members over the holiday season, here's a game to let you build your own bingo cards! 

Do you have an uncle who likes to compare Australia's indigenous population to cave dwellers? Do you have a cousin who forgives racism as long as it comes from a sexy man? How often does "pull themselves up by their bootstraps" come up in conversation? Put 'em in a bingo board and compete with your fellow lefty cousins to see who can eke a win out of these horrible conversations first! There's space to save up to 5 bingo boards in case you have Christmas with your racist uncle and Easter with your homophobic stepsister and get weekly calls from your aunt who only wants to talk about her new eggplant recipes. If your family is especially unpredictable,  try the "Random" button, it'll generate random items – add the ones that might apply. All your bases are covered! 

I'm still not sure if the bad person this bingo board is for is you the player, or the people inspiring the board...probably both? Either way, enjoy!
